languages.text: {n}Голос Паскаля становится сухим и колючим.{/n} "Дух машины запрашивает полномочия доступа данной единицы. Он не желает покоряться воле незнакомца без веской причины".
{n}Pasqal's voice becomes dry and bristly:{/n} "The machine spirit is requesting to know this unit's access privileges. It refuses to submit to a stranger's will without a compelling reason."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Паскаля становится сухим и колючим.{/n} "Дух машины запрашивает полномочия доступа данной единицы. Он не желает покоряться воле незнакомца без веской причины".

languages.text: {n}パスカルの声には感情を抑えていながらとげとげしさが滲む。{/n}「機械精霊は当ユニットのアクセス権について知りたいと言っています。相応の理由がなければ、よそ者の意思には従わぬということです」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice becomes dry and bristly:{/n} "The machine spirit is requesting to know this unit's access privileges. It refuses to submit to a stranger's will without a compelling reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの声には感情を抑えていながらとげとげしさが滲む。{/n}「機械精霊は当ユニットのアクセス権について知りたいと言っています。相応の理由がなければ、よそ者の意思には従わぬということです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的声音变得干涩而生硬。{/n}“这个机魂正在请求知晓本单元的访问权限。如果没有令人信服的理由，它会拒绝服从陌生人的意愿。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice becomes dry and bristly:{/n} "The machine spirit is requesting to know this unit's access privileges. It refuses to submit to a stranger's will without a compelling reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的声音变得干涩而生硬。{/n}“这个机魂正在请求知晓本单元的访问权限。如果没有令人信服的理由，它会拒绝服从陌生人的意愿。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'esprit de la machine demande à connaître les privilèges d'accès de cette unité, {n}déclare Pasqal d'un ton sec.{/n} Il refuse de se soumettre à la volonté d'un étranger sans raison valable. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice becomes dry and bristly:{/n} "The machine spirit is requesting to know this unit's access privileges. It refuses to submit to a stranger's will without a compelling reason."

traits.locale_text: « L'esprit de la machine demande à connaître les privilèges d'accès de cette unité, {n}déclare Pasqal d'un ton sec.{/n} Il refuse de se soumettre à la volonté d'un étranger sans raison valable. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz de Pasqal adquiere un tono firme y directo.{/n} «El espíritu máquina solicita conocer los privilegios de acceso de esta unidad. Se niega a someterse a la voluntad de un extraño sin una razón de peso».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice becomes dry and bristly:{/n} "The machine spirit is requesting to know this unit's access privileges. It refuses to submit to a stranger's will without a compelling reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Pasqal adquiere un tono firme y directo.{/n} «El espíritu máquina solicita conocer los privilegios de acceso de esta unidad. Se niega a someterse a la voluntad de un extraño sin una razón de peso».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Stimme wird trocken und borstig.{/n} "Der Maschinengeist erfragt die Zugangsprivilegien dieser Einheit. Er weigert sich, sich ohne einen zwingenden Grund dem Willen eines Fremden zu unterwerfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice becomes dry and bristly:{/n} "The machine spirit is requesting to know this unit's access privileges. It refuses to submit to a stranger's will without a compelling reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Stimme wird trocken und borstig.{/n} "Der Maschinengeist erfragt die Zugangsprivilegien dieser Einheit. Er weigert sich, sich ohne einen zwingenden Grund dem Willen eines Fremden zu unterwerfen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi, kuru ve agresif bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Makine ruhu, bu birimin erişim önceliklerini öğrenme talebinde bulunmakta. Geçerli bir sebep olmadığı sürece bir yabancının isteklerine boyun eğmeyi reddetmekte."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice becomes dry and bristly:{/n} "The machine spirit is requesting to know this unit's access privileges. It refuses to submit to a stranger's will without a compelling reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi kuru ve agresif bir hâl alıyor:{/n} "Makine ruhu, bu birimin erişim önceliklerini öğrenme talebinde bulunmakta. Geçerli bir sebep olmadığı sürece bir yabancının isteklerine boyun eğmeyi reddetmekte."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
